download.description: Whether to display the button for downloads on the video page.

like.description: Whether to display the button for likes on the video page.

owner.description: Whether to display the video owner's user name on the video page.

player.description: The contents of the player group.

airplay.description: Whether AirPlay is enabled in the video page player.

audio_tracks.description: Whether multiple audio tracks can appear in the video page player.

chromecast.description: Whether the Chromecast button appears in the video page player.

closed_captions.description: Whether closed captions are enabled in the video page player.

color_one.description: The first player color, which controls the color of the progress bar, buttons, and more.

color_three.description: The third player color, which controls the color of text and icons.

pip.description: Whether picture-in-picture is enabled in the video page player.

play_button.description: A representation of the play button's settings.

position.description:
The position of the play button within the video page player.

Option descriptions:
 * `auto` - Use Vimeo's default positioning for the play button.
 * `bottom` - The play button is positioned at the bottom of the player, except when in tiny mode.
 * `center` - The play button is positioned in the center of the player.

playbar.description: Whether to display the playbar on the video page.

quality_selector.description: Whether the quality selector appears in the video page player.

skipping_forward.description: Whether to enable users to skip forward in the embeddable player.

speed.description: Whether to display speed options in the video page player.

volume.description: Whether to display the volume control on the video page.

portrait.description: Whether to display the video owner's avatar on the video page.

share.description: Whether to display the button for shares on the video page.

tags.description: Whether to display tags for the video on the video page.

title.description: Whether to display the video title on the video page.

transcript.description: Whether to display the button for transcripts on the video page.

uploader.description: Whether to display the video's uploader on the video page.

uri.description: The URI of the page preset.

views.description: Whether to display the number of views that the video has received on the video page.

watch_later.description: Whether to display the button for watching later on the video page.

active.description: Whether the video version is currently active.

app.description: The API app associated with the video version.

audio_track_quota.description: The quota parameters for the audio tracks available for this version.

free.description: The number of audio tracks availible for this version.

has_reached_quota.description: Whether the current version has reached its maximum quota for audio tracks.

max.description: The maximum number of audio tracks that the user can upload per version based on their subscription tier.

used.description: The number of audio tracks used for this version.

can_restore_create.description: Whether the version can be restored.

create_storyboard_id.description: The storyboard ID of the video version.

created_time.description: The time in ISO 8601 format when the video version was created.

description.description: A description of the video version. This description can make use of the full unicode character set. This field appears in the response only when a corresponding value is present.
description.example: description with emoji

download_config.description: The download configuration associated with the version.

duration.description: The duration in seconds of the video version.

edit_session.description: Information about the video's Vimeo Create editing session. This data requires a bearer token with the `private` scope.

status.description:
The status of the video's edit session. This data requires a bearer token with the `private` scope.

Option descriptions:
 * `done` - The video is finished processing.
 * `failed` - Video processing has failed.
 * `processing` - The video is still being processed.

filename.description: The file name of the video version.

filesize.description: The size in byes of the video version file.

has_interactive.description: Whether the video has interactive capability.

video.description: Data from the video associated with the version.

options.description: An array of HTTP methods permitted on this URI.

total.description: The total number of videos on this connection.

uri.description: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.

modified_time.description: The time in ISO 8601 format when the video version was last modified.

origin_variable_frame_resolution.description: Whether the video has unified resolution. If the value of this field is `false`, the video requires transcoding.

status.description:
The status code for the availability of the video version.

Option descriptions:
 * `complete` - Transcoding is complete. The video version is available.
 * `error` - There was a transcoding error. The video version isn't available.
 * `in_progress` - Transcoding is in progress. The video version isn't available yet.

approach.description:
The approach for uploading the video.

Option descriptions:
 * `post` - The video upload uses the POST approach.
 * `pull` - The video upload uses the pull approach.
 * `tus` - The video upload uses the tus approach.

form.description: The HTML form for uploading a video through the POST approach.

gcs_uid.description: The ID of the Google Cloud Storage upload.

link.description: The link of the video to capture through the pull approach.

redirect_url.description: The redirect URL for the upload app.

size.description: The file size in bytes of the uploaded video.

status.description:
The status code for the availability of the uploaded video.

Option descriptions:
 * `complete` - The upload is complete.
 * `error` - The upload ended with an error.
 * `in_progress` - The upload is underway.

upload_link.description: The link for sending video file data.

upload_date.description: The time in ISO 8601 format when the video version was uploaded.

uri.description: The version's canonical relative URI.

user.description: The owner of the video version.

file_size_type.description:
The status of the video and its corresponding file size type.

Option descriptions:
 * `PROCESSING` - The video is still processing or transcoding, and its file size isn't available yet.
 * `QUOTA_EXEMPT_CLIP` - The video is exempt from the user's storage quota.
 * `QUOTA_EXEMPT_USER` - The user is on an unlimited plan, and the video doesn't count against their storage quota.
 * `STOCK` - The video is stock footage. Stock videos don't count against the user's storage quota.
 * `UPLOAD` - The video is a regular upload, and its file size counts against the user's storage quota.
 * `UPLOAD_FAILURE` - The video failed to upload, and its file size doesn't count against the user's storage quota.
 * `VIMEO_CREATE` - The video was created using the Vimeo Create app. Vimeo Create videos don't count against the user's storage quota.
 * `VIMEO_RECORD` - The video was recorded using the Vimeo Record app. Videos for some Vimeo Record API apps don't count against the user's storage quota.

num_versions.description: The number of versions for the video.

total_size.description: The total combined file size for all versions of the video.
